sprykerComponent.name: autocomplete-form
sprykerComponent.readme:
Enables users to quickly find and select from a pre-populated list of values as they type, leveraging searching and filtering.

Code sample

{% include molecule('autocomplete-form') with {
    attributes: {
        'suggestion-url': 'suggestion-url',
        'selected-value-key': 'selected-value-key',
        'value-data-attribute': 'value-data-attribute',
        'item-selector': 'item-selector',
        'show-clean-button': false
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
{
    id: required,
    name: 'query',
    value: '',
    hiddenValue: '',
    suggestionsUrl: required,
    placeholder: 'autocomplete.placeholder',
    showCleanButton: false
}

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetching An event which is triggered when an ajax request is sent to the server.

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetched An event which is triggered when an ajax request is closed.

tags.name: event
tags.description: change An event which is triggered when the search field is changed.

tags.name: event
tags.description: set An event which is triggered when the element of an autocomplete suggestion is selected.

tags.name: event
tags.description: unset An event which is triggered when the element of an autocomplete suggestion is removed.

methods.name: loadSuggestions
methods.description: Sends a request to the server and triggers the custom fetching and fetched events.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Clears the input value and the typed text.
